title: Hulu Live catches up to YouTube TV with unlimited DVR as part of base subscription
content:
Live TV services have been one of the best ways to keep up with news and sports channels in the age of streaming and expensive cable subscriptions, but each has its own set of pros and cons. A big advantage of YouTube TV has been its unlimited DVR, and now Hulu Live is picking up the same feature.

moreâ€¦

The post Hulu Live catches up to YouTube TV with unlimited DVR as part of base subscription appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The big advantage of YouTube TV over Hulu Live has long been unlimited DVR support, but that's changing as of April 13.
